item.title: Beogram 4000: Alternate "Circuit Diagram 2" with 24V Scale Illumination Lamps
item.description:
I recently acquired a well-preserved Beogram 4000 service manual containing a unique supplementary diagram. This diagram, Circuit Diagram 2, outlines the control system and features a notable difference in the position scale illumination. Instead of the typical two 12V bulbs wired in series, it depicts two 24V bulbs connected in parallel to the 24V power source. This discovery complicated a recent interaction with Sonavor, who is currently restoring his own Beogram 4000...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4000-alternate-circuit-diagram-2-with-24v-scale-illumination-lamps/

item.title: Beogram 4000: New Arrival from Italy
item.description:
I’m thrilled to be working on another Beogram 4000 restoration. The unit arrived from overseas in just three days and was packaged very well, ensuring its safe arrival. The exterior looks good overall. The wood veneer is undamaged and the dust cover can be polished back to its original shine. The aluminum trim on the back of the dust cover needs to be reattached, which should be a simple fix. Inside, the aluminum plates need a thorough cleaning...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4000-new-arrival-from-italy/
